title: dVRK arm 2.0
description: Configuration file format for the dVRK PSM arm component.  See [dVRK wiki](https://github.com/jhu-dVRK/sawIntuitiveResearchKit/wiki).  For details of implementation, see code under `sawIntuitiveResearchKit/components/code/mtsIntuitiveResearchKitArm.cpp`

kinematic.description: Kinematic configuration file, i.e. DH parameters for class `robManipulator`.

re-home.description: Force re-homing, i.e. computer encoder preloads based on potentiometer readings and for MTMs, search for mechanical limit for the last joint (roll)
